subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In his sixth week as the Blue Jays’ general manager, Alex Anthopoulos must decide what to do with Roy Halladay, the ace pitcher who will be entering the final year of his contract.
snippet: In his sixth week as the Blue Jays’ general manager, Alex Anthopoulos must decide what to do with Roy Halladay, the ace pitcher who will be entering the final year of his contract.
